## Missing Records

```{r}
# Get records with missing values
records_with_missing <- get_records_with_missing_values(steroid_dag_data)

# Display summary
if (nrow(records_with_missing) > 0) {
  cat("Found", nrow(records_with_missing), "records with missing values\n\n")

  # Show first few records
  head(records_with_missing, 10)

  # Write to CSV (one row per record_id with missing columns concatenated)
  records_with_missing |>
    mutate(missing_cols = sapply(missing_cols, paste, collapse = "; ")) |>
    write.csv("generated-csvs/missing_values_report.csv", row.names = FALSE)

  cat("\nMissing values report written to missing_values_report.csv\n")

} else {
  cat("No records with missing values found\n")
}

# To view missing columns for a specific row:
# - For first row: records_with_missing$missing_cols[[1]]
# - For specific record_id: records_with_missing |> filter(record_id == "your_id") |> pull(missing_cols) |> unlist()
# - To expand all into long format: records_with_missing |> unnest(missing_cols)
```

```{r}
# For records with missing derived variables, identify which input parameters are missing
get_missing_input_params_all <- function(records_with_missing, data, dictionary) {
  if (nrow(records_with_missing) == 0) {
    return(tibble(record_id = character(), missing_params = character()))
  }

  record_ids <- records_with_missing$record_id

  # Call each check function and combine results
  all_missing <- bind_rows(
    check_missing_sys_nmblockade_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_chron_steroid_moddose_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_chron_steroid_moddose_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_def_adrenal_insufficiency_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_def_adrenal_insufficiency_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_hyperglycemia_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_hyperglyc_hist_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_steroid_comorb_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_steroid_comorb_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_acute_allergic_reaction_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_age_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_chron_steroid_highdose_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_cop_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_dah_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_dementia_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_drug_toxicity_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_gi_bleeding_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_inflamprofile_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_inflamprofile_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_major_surgery_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_neuromuscular_disease_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_psi_score_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_acidosis_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_bilateral_opacities_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_bun_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_hypothermia_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_leukopenia_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_rr_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_scap_thrombocytopenia_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_septic_shock_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_str_vasculitis_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_active_covid19_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_active_fungal_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_active_influenza_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_ards_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_baseline_performance_status_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_chron_immunocomp_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_delirium_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_hypotension_sev_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_obstruct_lung_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_pneumonia_0(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_sepsis_0(data, record_ids, dictionary),
    check_missing_sys_septic_shock_0(data, record_ids, dictionary),
    check_missing_sys_resp_failure_sev_0(data, record_ids, dictionary),
    check_missing_sys_organ_failure_trajectory(data, record_ids),
    check_missing_sys_global_phys_sev_0(data, record_ids)
  )

  # Combine all missing parameters for each record_id
  all_missing |>
    group_by(record_id) |>
    summarize(
      missing_params = paste(unique(unlist(strsplit(missing_params, "; "))), collapse = "; "),
      .groups = "drop"
    )
}

# Get missing input parameters for records with missing derived variables
records_with_missing_params <- get_missing_input_params_all(records_with_missing, data, dictionary)

# Display summary

  records_with_missing_params |>

  cat("\nMissing input parameters report written to missing_params_report.csv\n")
} else {
  cat("No records with missing input parameters found\n")
}
```

## Unknown Records

```{r}
get_records_with_unknown_values <- function(data) {
  # For each row, find columns with unknown values (99 or -1)
  unknown_list <- lapply(1:nrow(data), function(i) {
    row <- data[i, ]
    unknown_cols <- names(row)[sapply(row, function(val) {
      !is.na(val) && (val == 99 || val == -1)
    })]

    if (length(unknown_cols) > 0) {
      tibble(
        record_id = data$record_id[i],
        unknown_cols = list(unknown_cols)
      )
    } else {
      NULL
    }
  })

  # Combine all non-NULL results
  bind_rows(unknown_list) |>
    arrange(record_id)
}

# Get records with unknown values
records_with_unknown <- get_records_with_unknown_values(steroid_dag_data)

# Display summary
if (nrow(records_with_unknown) > 0) {

} else {

}
```
